overview.title: Sri Sathya Sai Baba PU College Mysuru
overview.subtitle: Excellence in Education with Character Development
overview.description: Established in 1957, Sri Sathya Sai Baba PU College Mysuru has been a beacon of holistic education, nurturing students not just academically but also morally and spiritually. Under the divine guidance of Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, our institution has consistently strived to create citizens of exemplary character.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide holistic education that develops the head, heart, and hands of every student, creating individuals who excel academically while being grounded in moral and spiritual values.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be a leading educational institution that transforms students into responsible global citizens who contribute positively to society through service, love, and wisdom.

items.name: Non-Violence (Ahimsa)
items.description: Respect for all life and peaceful coexistence

history.title: Our Heritage
history.subtitle: Six decades of educational excellence and service

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: Late Smt. Sunandamma, deeply inspired by Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, established the school with a vision of value-based education.

milestones.title: CBSE Affiliation
milestones.description: The school received CBSE affiliation, expanding its reach and standardizing its academic excellence.

milestones.title: Pre-University College
milestones.description: Added Pre-University programs to provide complete secondary education under one roof.

milestones.title: Infrastructure Expansion
milestones.description: Major infrastructure development including modern laboratories, library, and sports facilities.

milestones.title: Digital Integration
milestones.description: Introduction of smart classrooms and digital learning resources for enhanced education delivery.

milestones.title: Pandemic Response
milestones.description: Successful transition to online learning during COVID-19, ensuring uninterrupted education for all students.

founder_president.name: Late Smt. Sunandamma
founder_president.title: Founder President
founder_president.description: A devoted follower of Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, Smt. Sunandamma dedicated her life to establishing an educational institution that would nurture both academic excellence and moral values. Her vision of holistic education continues to guide our institution today.
founder_president.legacy: Her unwavering commitment to value-based education has shaped thousands of students who have gone on to serve society with integrity and compassion.

divine_inspiration.name: Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba
divine_inspiration.title: Divine Guide
divine_inspiration.description: Born in Puttaparthi, Andhra Pradesh, in 1926, Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba was a spiritual teacher and humanitarian whose teachings on love, service, and human values form the foundation of our educational philosophy.
divine_inspiration.teachings: His emphasis on 'Education in Human Values' and the development of the human personality continues to inspire our curriculum and approach to education.
